summary: A comedy that follows two high school students -- one overachiever struggling to write his valedictorian speech, the other a senior now going on his 15th year of school.
cast: Snoop Dogg|Wiz Khalifa|Mike Epps|Teairra Mari|Derek Kane|Luenell|Teni Panosian|Paul Iacono|Andy Milonakis|Mystikal|Far East Movement|Kendre Berry|Samantha Cope|Alicia Monet Caldwell|Affion Crockett|Eunice Kiss|Andray Johnson|Roz Wilson|Bishop Don Magic Juan|Winston James Francis|Carla Howe|Jamieson Stern|Melissa Howe|Kelly Pantaleoni|Shvona Lavette Chung|Cordelle Braudus|Jennifer Andrade|Young Pilot|Raul Delante|Ivy Natalia|Dennis George Brown Jr.|YG|Julilan Alexander|Langston|Day Day|James Koo|Tyga|Britaniya Philmon|Miriam Habtemariam|Hadan Yovsef|Jeffrey Cannady|Michael Kato|Ashton Winger|Charles E. title: Mac & Devin Go to High School
